author: Joe Scott
description:
To try everything Brilliant has to offer for free, visit http://brilliant.org/answerswithjoe. You’ll also get 20% off an annual premium subscription!

In today’s Lightning Round video (yes, another one), we talk about the new thorium molten salt reactor under construction in China, the pros and cons of human spaceflight, the new acting head of NASA, and the horrors of the rat king phenomenon.

title: The First Thorium Reactor Is FINALLY Under Construction | Lightning Round
